name: BlindWrite 5 Disc Track Information File
summary: A B5T file is a data file used by VSO Software BlindWrite, a program designed to create backup copies of optical discs, such as CDs and DVDs . It contains metadata in the XML standard, such as track information and details about the structure of the disc, helping BlindWrite accurately reproduce the original disc during the copying process.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
